short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to find products on ASOS by image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a search engine to find products on ASOS store by image.

With this extension you will be able to easily search on ASOS by image.

To search by image you just have to right click on any picture you find online (on AliExpress, on Zara, on Shein… etc) and hit “Search on ASOS”. 

You will see that the results will appear instantly.
